description: Unique identifier for an attachment record associated with a fleet entity.
Identifier of the parent record the file is attached to (asset, work order, inspection, etc.); exact entity varies by context and should be confirmed with SME.
Original file name provided at upload, including extension.
User-entered description or title for the attachment to aid identification and search.
Coded indicator of attachment type or target context (e.g., document, photo, specific module); confirm code definitions with SME.
User who created or uploaded the attachment record.
Date and time the attachment record was created or uploaded.
User who last modified the attachment metadata or file.
Date and time of the most recent update to the attachment record.
Current lifecycle status of the attachment record (e.g., active, inactive, soft-deleted).
Date and time the photo was captured on the device; may default to upload time if capture time is unavailable.
Longitude coordinate where the photo was captured or uploaded, if available.
Latitude coordinate where the photo was captured or uploaded, if available.
Cloud object storage ETag or hash for the file, used to verify content integrity and support deduplication.
Size of the stored file, typically in bytes; confirm unit with SME.
